00043 void NicEntryDirect::connectTo(NicEntry* other)
00044 {
00045     cModule* otherPtr = other->nicPtr;
00046 
00047     nicEV <<"connecting nic #"<<nicId<< " and #"<<other->nicId<<endl;
00048 
00049     cGate *radioGate=NULL;
00050     if( (radioGate = otherPtr->gate("radioIn")) == NULL )
00051     throw cRuntimeError("Nic has no radioIn gate!");
00052 
00053     outConns[other] = radioGate->getPathStartGate();
00054 }
00055 
00061 void NicEntryDirect::disconnectFrom(NicEntry* other)
00062 {
00063     nicEV <<"disconnecting nic #"<<nicId<< " and #"<<other->nicId<<endl;
00064     outConns.erase(other);
00065 }
